title: 2025: the year companies prepare to disrupt how work gets done
message: The world of work has changed enormously in the last two decades. Mobile devices, e-commerce, and social media have all impacted how and where we work. But whatâ€™s new now is how AI is starting to drive the next wave of change. Itâ€™s creating demand for new jobs and skills, transforming roles and careers, and spurring productivity and innovation.
